summary: This mod adds a ring and spells to the game which will slow your descent and prevent you from getting killed or creating damaging shockwaves when you hit the ground. Currently includes Slow Fall, Flame Fall and Storm Fall
descriptionHtml:
User Guide
======================================================================
The ring can be made at a forge using a gold ingot. Simply equip the ring when you want to prevent falling damage and unequip when your done. It will also slow down time as you fall.

Both the Slow fall and Flame fall spell tomes can be found at the Riverwood Trader but I hope to expand this.

Slow fall will slow time once cast and prevent damage being taken when you hit the ground. The spell will wear off after 10 seconds or once you have landed, which ever occurs first.

Flame fall does not slow time as you fall but will cause a fiery shockwave once you land. The shockwave will damage nearby NPCs aswell as knocking them over. You will not take any damage from the fall once you land either. The spell will wear off after 10 seconds or once you have landed, which ever occurs first.

Storm fall does not slow time as you fall but will cause a electrical shockwave once you land. The shockwave will damage nearby NPCs aswell as draining mana. You will not take any damage from the fall once you land either. The spell will wear off after 10 seconds or once you have landed, which ever occurs first.

Release News
======================================================================
Latest release fixes the damage being caused by the slow fall ring and spells

Bugs
=======================================================================
Not currently seeing anything major myself but let me know if you come across any

Aims
======================================================================
Creating a levitation spell
Adding the Spell tomes to more vendors throughout Skyrim instead of just in Riverwood.
More shockwave variants (frost, rock, fus ro dah)
A propel spell which will allow you glide forwards as you fall

Feedback
======================================================================
This mod was originally posted on to Steam Workshop
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=17328

If you have any suggestions/bugs then please feel free to comment and Ill do my best to address them
